PersonalStatement.text: Erik Perez, born on 1985-06-03, is a Male based in South Jennifershire, Belgium. He is Married and holds Ethiopian nationality. Currently working at Boyer-Valdez.

WorkExperience.text: Systems Administrator at Patterson-Lopez from 2006 to 2016.
Senior Systems Administrator at Boyer-Valdez, 2020 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from American University in Dubai
Master's in Engineering from Fundación Universidad De Bogotá-Jorge Tadeo Lozano

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys coding personal projects.
